responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Insecure JavaScript execution during page load
    analysis: |
      The HTML file located at 'tests/bad_full.html' includes an event handler (onload) within the body tag and a separate embedded script tag that directly executes JavaScript code. When this HTML file is loaded, it automatically executes JavaScript alerts, which can potentially be exploited for cross-site scripting (XSS) if user-provided or untrusted content is improperly incorporated into these sections without adequate filtering and escaping. This vulnerability, if left unaddressed in live environments, could expose the site to script insertion attacks where malicious scripts could be executed in the context of the user's session.
    cwe: CWE-79
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - tests/bad_full.html
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: Insecure JavaScript execution during page load
leads.analysis: The HTML file located at 'tests/bad_full.html' includes an event handler (onload) within the body tag and a separate embedded script tag that directly executes JavaScript code. When this HTML file is loaded, it automatically executes JavaScript alerts, which can potentially be exploited for cross-site scripting (XSS) if user-provided or untrusted content is improperly incorporated into these sections without adequate filtering and escaping. This vulnerability, if left unaddressed in live environments, could expose the site to script insertion attacks where malicious scripts could be executed in the context of the user's session.
